item.title: ASUS ROG PHONE 3 Strix Edition - Gaming Smartphone (ZS661KS) 8GB+256GB - Official ASUS MALAYSIA
item.detail: The ROG Phone 3 Strix Edition uses the flagship Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 865 Mobile Platform with advanced 5G1 mobile communications capabilities. Built for dedicated gamers, it has an amazing new 144 Hz / 1 ms display that leaves the competition standing. Alongside slick features like AirTrigger 3, you’ll find a monster 6000 mAh battery2, a unique side-charging design, dual front-facing stereo speakers, and a full range of modular accessories. ROG Phone 3 Strix Edition is everything you’ve always wanted for mobile gaming!
